TopicTitle: Marauder Space Plane & von Richthoven Interplanetary Starship

Articles.Content:
Marauder SSTO Space Plane

This beauty will take a crew of up to 10 Kerbals to LKO and back. Great for crew transfers from passing starships or just to admire the great flame effects to and from space...

Marauder Space Plane by Jolly Roger on Sketchfab

Hot Keys:

1) Toggle Whiplash Turbojet Engines

2) Toggle Rapier Engines

3) Switch Mode for Rapier Engines

4) Toggle LV-N Nuclear Engines

Download Marauder space plane HERE

von Richthofen Interplanetary Starship

This all-in-one craft features:

- On-board drills and ISRU for planetary refueling

- Separate landing engines for VTOL type landings on moons and small planets

- Detachable resource scanning sensors

- RCS tug

- Configurable probe and separate science experiment pod

- Ability to drive around on planetary surfaces

- Max crew capacity of 11

- On-board science lab & reusable experiments

Von Richthofen Explorer by Jolly Roger on Sketchfab

Hot Keys

1) Toggle Main Engines

2) Toggle Landing Engines

3) Deploy Drills

4) Start Mining Operations (Drills, ISRU, Power)

5) Stop Mining Operations

"Lights" toggle solar panels as well

Download von Richthoven interplanetary starship HERE

I'm glad you guys like the craft - I don't play the game the same way most people do, and I prefer to go for design over efficiency, that's just my style. There was lots of stuff going on in the video and I really didn't show some of the capabilities of the von Richthoven like the fact that it can drive across the surface of a planet in order to hit multiple locations for some of those more complex contracts, or the fact that you can pretty much do a grand tour, and I didn't even show any of the science capabilities.

This was one of my first all-in-one craft and I wasn't very far along the tech tree when I designed it (I had just barely got to the ISRU stage). I have a backlog of other craft that I need to finalize and do videos for so I'm going to start working on the next one right away. I want to get some of these old designs out of the way before 1.0.5 drops and I get inspired to create more monstrosities.

JR

Cool, I originally designed it in V0.90 and it was able to go out to Minmus and back with a crew of 10 - so I really wanted to get this design working in V1.0.4. Too bad it can no longer get past LKO but that's what the interplanetary starships are for. I think the video really captured it nicely.
